actions.description: Frenzy [Multi-Attack]: 2×Bite Bite [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8) and Medium or smaller Targets must pass [Endure] or be knocked Prone Babble [Action, Aura Near | Will]: Confused (Cd4) Spit [Ranged Attack, Near | Endure]: Blinded (Cd4)
